author: Ted Byrne
content:
Hmmmm..... menacing hulk against a romatically colored background. This is schizzy. You'd make a hell of a horror flick director. Um, or maybe a chick flick director. Or Howabout a horror chick flick? On the other hand, I find most chick flicks to be horrors. Guess it's been done.

Still, maybe, "Halloween Hayride Romance"... That's got it all, right?
